_header: Whoso will his worship save / Honest manners he must have
_description: Proverbial saying about link between honesty and worship — one couplet

Bod315.Transcription: Who so wol his worship saueHonest maners he most haue
Bod315.Note: Formerly included under 2711; occurs with that and with 1879, 6568, 6621.5; all originally copied from Cornwall,  olim Launceston Priory,  a wall inscription, no longer visible.
Bod315.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Wall Verses at Launceston Priory.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         200 (1963): 338-43: 342, 343.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 562.
